settings.title: We believe, everyone deserves great designs.

settings.subheading:
Our brand name is inspired by the Japanese art of living and it translates as “ To Live”. We at Ikiru ensure to curate only the smartest and most minimalist product options from selected brands. We use Indian craftsmanship and global aesthetics to make each piece of decor unique and beautiful.

Established in 2021, IKIRU is a curated home decor store. We are based out of Indore and are functional pan India. We have different theme ideas for you to attain your home decor desires with a perfect blend of cultural wisdom and modern sensibilities.

settings.title: “We promise to bring you finely curated and high-quality decor from reliable and verified brands with a clear vision.”
settings.radmore_content: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

settings.heading: What we do
settings.subheading:
Our team of qualified professionals ensures to bring you the best and trending furniture, soft furnishing, lighting, home accessories, and decor, that are unique in style, exquisite, and rare. 

Everything you need to elevate your home is thoughtfully curated and brought to you in a unique theme-based way by IKIRU.

settings.title: What we do
settings.text:
Our team of qualified professionals ensures to bring you the best and trending furniture, soft furnishing, lighting, home accessories, and decor, that are unique in style, exquisite, and rare. 

Everything you need to elevate your home is thoughtfully curated and brought to you in a unique theme-based way by IKIRU.
settings.radmore_content: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

settings.text:
- We focus on unique, multifunctional products, that are built with high-quality craftsmanship, adding value to your home, and inspired by minimalism. 

- Our team goes out of their zone to find the emerging brands, best manufacturers, and experienced artisans to create the best style under multiple themes like Bohemian, Coastal, Rustic, Earthy, Indian, Moroccan, Japandi, and Scandinavian.

- We are building a solid community of Interior designers and architects from all over the country. On our platform, like-minded people can come together to learn from one another, source products, and share ideas.
